name: guestbookMEAN
description: A guestbook built on the MEAN stack
author: Stefan <stefan@wickedshell.net>

scripts.tests_cleanup: rmdir /S /Q app-cov & rmdir /S /Q test\coverage & rmdir /S /Q test\result
scripts.tests_init: npm run tests_cleanup & jscoverage --exclude=public app app-cov & mkdir test\coverage & mkdir test\result
scripts.tests: npm run tests_init & SET multi=html-cov=test/coverage/index.html xunit=test/result/test-result.xml & mocha
